TopicTitle: My first manned Mun landing, with a 18t rover!

Articles.Content:
Jebadiah didn't just want to be the first Kerbal on the Mun, he wanted to do it in style with his giant rover. I didn't take any screens during the mission because, well i didn't think it had any chance of success.

Jebadiah and Bill ecstatic at still being alive and on the Mun with the undamaged rover

Some screens of the skycrane I had to use to lower the rover to the Mun, it took an eternity of tweaking the position of the engines and moving pieces of the rover around to get the centers of mass and thrust balanced.
Very cool. I love huge monstrosities like this .
